summary: A pytest suite marked for user acceptance that validates loading an LHM project file via an environment variable, configuring a MODFLOW 6 simulation with regridding and allocation settings, and writing HFB (head‑flow‑boundary) packages using the imod library.
business_intent: Confirm that the LHM model integrates correctly with the MODFLOW 6 workflow and satisfies user‑acceptance criteria before it is released for operational use.
